fields.label: passNo
fields.infoText:
Provide an estimate of the number of  passengers that you will carry in each destination band from a UK airport during the next 12 months. 


Do not include passengers who are exempt from Air Passenger Duty.

fields.label: Where can I find out more about destination bands A and B?
fields.infoText:
To find out  more about destination bands and see a list of destinations that fall into each band:
* open a new window or tab

* go to GOV.UK

* search for 'Rates for Air Passenger Duty' on GOV.UK.

By submitting this registration you confirm that the information you have provided is true and complete.

This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.

fields.label: ackpageInfo
fields.infoText:
HMRC will send you a letter to confirm your registration details and return dates so that you can prepare your first Air Passenger Duty return. 


If you are a plane operator based outside the UK, you must appoint a UK based agent or representative. For details of how to do this, go to the [guidance page] for Air Passenger Duty on GOV.UK

If you operate direct long haul flights from Northern Ireland, you need to contact the Central Assurance Team on APDHelpdesk@hmrc.gov.uk
